程序包 model

类 Medicine

Object
Medicine
public class Medicine extends Object
The Medicine class represents a medicine with details such as stock level, low stock level alert line, replenishment request status, and price.

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明

    isRequestingReplenishment
    The replenishment request status of the medicine.

    The low stock level alert line of the medicine.

    The unique identifier for the medicine.
    private String
    name
    The name of the medicine.
    private float
    price
    The price of the medicine.
    private int
    stock
    The stock level of the medicine.

    • Medicine

      public Medicine(String medicineId, String name, int stock, int lowStockThreshold, boolean isRequestingReplenishment, float price)
      Constructs a new Medicine with the specified details.
      参数:
      medicineId - the unique identifier for the medicine
      name - the name of the medicine
      stock - the stock level of the medicine
      lowStockThreshold - the low stock level alert line of the medicine
      isRequestingReplenishment - the replenishment request status of the medicine
      price - the price of the medicine
